Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Oakland in 2007...
Traded from Oakland to Washington on 4/23/2010 (Going to WSH: RF M. Stanton. Going to OAK: C K. Shoppach, 1B T. Lee)...
Traded from Washington to Arizona on 1/31/2011 (Going to ARI: RF M. Stanton, P M. Bumgarner, P C. Carrasco. Going to WSH: C J. Mauer, 1B A. Pujols, P A. Cook)...
Traded from Arizona to Cleveland on 7/31/2014 (Going to ARI: P H. Takahashi, P M. Delcarmen, P A. Reed. Going to CLE: RF M. Stanton, P M. Bumgarner, P D. Hudson)...
Had first career hit on 5/9/2015, off Mark Lowe (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/14/2015, off John H. Patterson (TOR)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 9/18/2015...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston on 4/25/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/26/2019, hitting .391 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Seattle, driving in 6 runs on 9/22/2019...
Hit 3 homeruns against Toronto, driving in 4 runs on 6/26/2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 6/25/2021...
Traded from Cleveland to Houston on 7/31/2022 (Going to CLE: 2B A. Moinelo, P B. Hendrickson. Going to HOU: 1B G. Stanton, 1B T. Shanks)...
